meanings.sent1: The ships sailed across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The harbor was filled with majestic ships.
meanings.sent3: The tiny toy ship floated in the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: The ships on the horizon looked like floating cities.
meanings.sent5: The pirate ship had tattered sails and a skull flag.

meanings.sent1: They ships goods to other countries.
meanings.sent2: She ships packages to customers worldwide.
meanings.sent3: He ships his homemade jam to friends as gifts.
meanings.sent4: The company ships its products using reliable carriers.
meanings.sent5: The online store ships orders promptly for customer satisfaction.

meanings.definition: To engage in the business of shipping goods.
meanings.sent1: The company ships products to retailers.
meanings.sent2: She ships items for international trade.
meanings.sent3: He ships goods from the warehouse to stores.
meanings.sent4: The shipping company ships cargo worldwide.
meanings.sent5: The online platform ships orders efficiently to customers.
